Description: Action user roles
Need more info.

A string containing Agreement Attributes' and its expected auto formatting/computation in JSON format. The attribute (IncludeInContractType) indicates that it can contain pipe separated contract type technical name and the formula would be applied on mentioned contract types only.
Its value may also have 'All' when we want it to be applied to all the contract types. Leaving it blank or Non existence of this key would apply this formula on all contract types. The attribute (ExcludeInContractType) indicates that it can contain pipe separated contract type technical name and the formula would not be applied on mentioned contract types.
Flag indicating whether to evaluate event rules before approval rules on agreement update.

The downloaded agreement/associated document file name. 
            value should be in the following format "[{"EntityName":"AssociatedDocument","FileNameFormat":"{{<attributeName1>}}_{{<attributeName2>}"},{"EntityName":"Agreement","FileNameFormat":"{{<attributeName1>}}_{{<attributeName2>}"}]". 
 NOTE: The attributes used here should be common attributes for all contract types.
 Default value: "{{ICMEntityName}}_{{ICMAgreementCode}}_{{ICMAgreementDocumentVersion}}"
SpecialProperties that can be used are {{ICMEntityName}}, {{ICMAgreementDocumentVersion}} as they do not have attribute in the instance
Store all executed contract at different storage with customer name as Folder. Box Storage is configured then value should be false as no preview documents need to be generated

Store all executed contract at different storage with customer name as Folder
E.g. {{ICMPartyName}}-{{ICMAgreementCode}}-v{{ICMAgreementDocumentVersion}}_{{ICMEffectiveDate}}
Number of seconds to keep Agreement cached during load process
Used to enable/ disable the Contract Request feature.
Enables/disables the ability to use search metric tiles on dashboard
File extension for associated document
File extension for third party
Display enhanced create action buttons: Create&Publish, Create&SendForApproval on create wizard
Flag for whether to allow user to upload document with an ID not matching with the ID of document already in system
A Flag Indicating whether multiple login sessions are allowed per user
The flag indicating whether to allow agreement creation without selecting template.
Represent regex to check alphabet in the text.
Flag to decide if unnecessary publish of contract types to be avoided.

dicates maximum number of times to check whether current modification operation, if any, is completed or not.
For infinite trials, set the value less than 0.
NOTE: modification operation = any kind of operation which would modify the instance.

Indicates time between the checks to find out whether current modification operation, if any, is completed or not.
 NOTE: modification operation = any kind of operation which would modify the instance.
Maximum number of dictionary members allow to be json deserialize
The flag indicating whether to use overloaded insert table method in Agreement helper
Service Provider encryption certificate store location.
Service Provider encryption certificate store name.
Service Provider certificate thumbprint using which SAML Response will be encrypted
Color to be used for highlight the metadata, if set none then the entire feature would turn off.
This settings is used to filter the attributes and reset the values when amendment is created, this will be used on Edit screen
List of attributes that should not be synced when third party agreement doc is published from word addin
List of the all the attribute types that we want to not highlight, set it none if we want to highlight all attribute type, Ref AttributeDataType enum. Have values comma sperated without spaces

The flag indicating whether to enable audience restriction in case of SSO. If flag is set to true the URL needs to be configured to which IdP will issue an SAML response. Upon receving the SAML  response, the response URL will get validated against the configured URL
Flag to decide whether upload of files having double extensions should be blocked.
This is Box App User Name. This needs to be configured to create pool of App Users with Prefix
This is Box Client Id
This is Box Client Secret
This is Box Enterprise Id
This is Box App User Group.
This is Box App User pool size.
This is Box Private Key. This is required to be generated
This is Box Private Key Password
This is Box Public Key id. This is available once you register your Application on BOX with Public key generated
The Bulk Insert Excel Add-In vesion of this build.This will be displayed on ICM Version Information popup.
This is Box Link Expiry period. Default 90
Cache user dashboard tiles to search with their count.
The Cache Service Endpoint URI
The Cache Service Password
Indicates the type of cache host to use.
Comma separated value for font family name and size [Make sure first parameter is font family and second is the size of the font]
A boolean flag indicating whether to provide license to accept when user logs in for the first time.
Need more info.
Click To Accept Attribute Name.
Token for verifying client app signed requests e.g. Salesforce signed request.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether client validation is enabled.
The setting that defines the time after which query will end with error if not finished earlier
Confidential Org path's id. We need to create new ORG unit with name 'Confidential' at the root org unit and set it's ID as a value here.
Content Access token expiry time in seconds
Flag indicating whether to exit contract admin rule evaluation on the first satisfied rule.
Need more info.
The name of the topic on which contract type publish request message is sent.
Font size to be used while merging documents in assembly

This value is to set Command Time out In Seconds.  This config key is to be used strictly for ACF ExecuteCustsomization Calls which is taking more than 30 seconds. Warning = This key should be used only after consultation with DB support

This key helps disable Clause Library, Template and Config Administration tiles so that Config changes can be prevented on production unless there is an emergency.  This helps make P2P easier, and allows inadvertent or intentional changes by Support or Customers in production without going through the P2P process

This key defines the attribute name of the extended agreement clause master data contract type, which will be used to hold relation between agreement clause and extended agreement clause master data. Value for this key must be the technical name of the attribute.

This key defines the master data entity name which needs to be created for extended agreement clauses. The use case could be users will create the required master data as mentioned in this key and ICM will read the attributes from that master data which will be used for further processing or to decide the respective agreement clauses. e.g. This master data entity could be used to track the flow down agreement clauses
Enable or disable broadcast feature on agreement details page

This key indicates comma separated values which will help to select business owners in case of creating the commitment.        The value in this key will help to show those users as Business Owners while adding the commitment. 
For e.g. if the key value is set as internal in that case only Internal users will be shown while creating the commitment. 
If the value contains externalusers and user selects only external user as a business owner in that case a validation will be triggered which will not allowed external users alone to be added as part of Business owners while creating the commitment.  The value of key should not be externalusers alone otherwise it will block It will block commitment creation

This key can be used to specify the custom workflow states for agreement (comma separated), that can be used to list down additional custom workflow states on top of core workflow states.  This helps in taking some action around these custom workflow states. One such usage can be found around Evaluating Rules.
Indicates whether to deprecate previous document version on random document upload
Configuration setting to define placeholders (CSV) for docusign default message. Placeholders will be replaced by actual agreement values.

Boolean value which when set to true enables the selection of associations during download all button click, otherwise downloads all the latest versions of the documents of all associations. The files will be included in a zip file. 
 For example : If a contract type MSA has 3 associations ESOP, SOW, NDA and you want the user to have the ability to download only ESOP or NDA or SOW, set the value to true.
If you want to enforce download of all the latest versions of all the associations i.e. ESOP and SOW and NDA, then set the value to false.
Specifies comma separated Statuses for which, trigger Evaluate Dynamic association rule on update Event

This key will enable 'Copy Associated Documents' button on Agreement and Associated Document Details page.
This functionality will allow user to copy associations across agreements and across multilevel associations.

Enable or disable file path on agreement wizard template page.  Setting this value to true will enable file path control on template page allowing user to select a non system template (valid file) as own type.
Email id to send email copy to
Email id to which all external signatory requests should be forwarded to
Email id to which all internal signatory requests should be forwarded to
An enum indicating whether emails send for signature should be redirected or not
Name of the Masterdata entity that extends the Commitment entity.
Attribute name of the Masterdata entity that contains unique Identifier of corresponding Commitment entity instance.
This key indicated whether to hide or show the chevron on agreement create, edit & details page
This key indicated whether to hide or show the Org Node attribute on agreement create, preview & details page
Replace special character in file name with '_' before upload.

Show Internal User's role as Internal Reviewer in Review Process. If this is set to True, when agreement will be sent for review, if the reviewer is Internal User, it’s role in Team tab will be shown as “Internal Reviewer”. If set to false, it will be shown as “External Reviewer”
The attributes that hold internal and external sign dates could be different per entity per client. This key holds the attribute names for internal and external sign dates per entity.
This setting controls whether to allow assembly of non tagged rule based clauses into the agreement.
This key contains the comma separated list of strings that can be ignore while decoding the values of attributes.

This key indicates comma separated list of post execution states (e.g. Executed, WaitingForReview, Reviewed, Superseded) for which peer association can be added. If we do not want to allow peer association for any of these states, this value should be set to blank.
Boolean value to add self to the agreement team.

Flag to determine if the Send Notifications checkbox should be visible. If true, then the Send Notifications checkbox will be visible and checked.  If false, then the Send Notification checkbox will not be visible but checked always

Flag to determine whether Template selection is allowed in edit agreement. If true, then Template selection will be allowed in edit agreement. If false, then Template selection will not be allowed in edit agreement
This flag indicates whether to On/Off reverse sync feature while uploading a document for agreement. If true, Reverse Sync feature will be turn On. If false, Reverse Sync feature will be turn Off
Show Upload Document button on details page of agreement in PreDraft state

This flag indicates whether to On/Off Orphan amendment creation (without parent agreement). Applicable for Agreement type of Contract only. On creation of Orphan amendment, system will internally create placeholder agreement in Executed state  which will have same data as that of amendment and link to it. If true, Orphan amendment creation will be allowed. If false, Orphan amendment creation will not be allowed.

This key defines the all the parameters required for the application monitoring performance, by default its value will be None.  The Key value can be the collection of comma separated keys and values. Provider Sub key is Mandatory & it defines which APM [Application Performance Monitoring] is enabled for this Application. If we use Provider as ‘MSAppInsights’ it will enable Azure app insights for application and send data to azure app insight resource which is created.
Comma seperated (list) and Pipe(|) separated (Range) of IP Adresses which are allowed to access the application during the maintenance mode. Others will be redirected to Maintenance page.
Attribute to enable / disable maintenance mode of the Application.

List of SSL certificate thumbprints to add in the Trusted Root of local machine.  Each thumbprint is separated by semicolon. This can be used to add certificates that are customer specific, and when they have to be specifically added when the node is starting up. For example, we use a jnj.com certificate instead of an icertis.com certificate
Comma separated technical names of attributes which should not be copied while copying an Associated Document across agreements/multilevel associations.

This key will enable 'CreateAndSendForApproval' button and functionality on Associated Document create page.
 Button visibility is NOT controlled via Role Action Mapping, similar to Agreement CreateAndSendForApproval button.

This key will enable multilevel association feature for Associated Document. If enabled, "Associations" tab will be displayed while creating / updating "Associated Document" Contract Type where other contract types can be associated

Specifies comma separated associated document contract type names for which,  create instance or update instance (in approved state) action will send instance directly for approval.  For other contract types, instance will stay in draft state. User will have "Send For Approval" as an explicit action
A flag indicating whether Tracking Attribute functionality should be enabled for Associated Document

Configuration setting to switch ON/OFF the bulk import/export functionality. If true, then import/export options will be displayed for associate documents to manage bulk associations. This comes to effect only when "Document Assembly" option is off and workflow is not available for associated document.

onfiguration setting to control the UI behaviour of associated documents for add/edit/copy actions. The configuration value specifies where to open associate document i.e. in popup/page. This comes to effect only when  "Document Assembly" option is off and workflow is not available for associated document.

The flag indicating whether to replace th. If this key does not exist, or has an invalid value, it will be assumed to be false.e word in agreement  in the audit log history message with the contract type display name

Contains the configuration required for rendering tabs and filtering audit log  entries based on tab selection
resourceKeyName = name of the resource key whose corresponding value needs to used as the tab name
 seqNo = sequence in which the tabs need to be displayed
 filterBy = this will have 2 values, either workflowstates or events
workflowstates = filtering will be done on the workflow states
events = filtering will the done on the events
 filter = comma separated list of filtering criteria

String   Visiblity of the Fields in the Grid view of Audit History.   Customers need to customize the fields they want to see in the Grid view in the Audit History.  A comma Seperated list(without spaces) can be configured by the customers and the grid will only display those configured columns in the Grid.

et expiry time in minutes to validate RequestVerificationToken.
 Given that RequestVerificationToken token is rendered on UI And token has a date time included in it
 And token is older than expiry duration (e.g. token was generated 35 minutes ago)
When such a RequestVerificationToken sent in a request header for POST action Then System will verify that token is older than defined expiry duration. And request will not be processed. This expiry duration should be same as InactivityLogoutTimeMinutes or little longer by few minutes than InactivityLogoutTimeMinutes.

lag to determine whether the Shared Org Path check for the Entity considers the Org Group the user belongs to. If user belongs to an organization group (Consisting Org Units 'A' and 'B')  then user should be able to see all the agreements which have Org Path ='A' or 'B' as well as user should be able to see all the Agreement which have Shared Org Path as 'A' or 'B'. 
IMPORTANT NOTE: This setting violates the way Shared Org Path is supposed to work, especially if A or B have child nodes and Org Groups cut across the organization; this is a limited hack for cases like 3M!
 If true, then users belonging to an organization group will be able to access agreements via shared and default path both. If false, then users belonging to an organization group will be able to access agreements via only default path.
Master data entity name which stores the mapping of standard document saved search name and contract type name.
Maximum number of records that can be created via auto association. This setting will be a limit to guard against an incorrect saved search that may result in large number of auto associations.

Default OrgPath for Clauses when Enable access control for Clauses is true. In order to enable access control on Clauses, we need to set correct OrgPath on each instance. Value of this setting will be used in that case. 
This will restrict access to clauses to users having access to specified org path Or if they are present in clause’s team. Its value can be any org path from available org structure.

Default OrgPath for Clauses when Enable access control for Clauses is true.  In order to enable access control on Clauses, we need to set correct OrgPath on each instance. Value of this setting will be used in that case.  This will restrict access to clauses to users having access to specified org path Or if they are present in clause’s team. Its value can be any org path from available org structure.
A flag indicating whether Tracking Attribute functionality should be enabled for Contract Request
This key is to decide whether composite attribute functionality is enable or not

This key defines the Maximum number of possible attributes to be added in a contract type. System will not allow adding attributes more than the value mentioned in this configuration. Warning: Do not change this config value as it might have adverse effect on ICM performance and may cause DB level compatibility issue. Changing this value from 250 to anything larger will need VP level approval from PS as well as Engineering.

Key to specify assembly namespace for customization hooks. 
 Core hooks can be implemented by Custom Plugins and / or Business App Plugins. If, both, Custom and App plugins have implemented the same core hook, in order to prioritize the Custom hook implementation, this key specifies which namespace is to be considered for picking Custom hook implementation. If namespace exists, only Custom implementation from that is picked, if not present, all implementations will be considered (including Custom, App and other implementations, if any). This concept is applicable for any hook over hook implementation.
Boolean value if set to true will open the "Add Comment" pop up on Approve or Reject action of deviation. If set to false, approve or reject action will not open the "Add Comment" pop up.

Specifies PDF with maximum how many pages can be assembled by ICM. To assemble PDF file, ICM will convert each page to image and will merge to main document.
If uploaded document has more pages than this setting value then ICM will not assemble that associated document into main contract at all. Setting value 0 turns off the PDF assembly. Maximum value could be same as max integer value
This flag indicates whether to On/Off document validations for various actions for Agreement, Amendment[Same as agreement] and association.

This setting will control the type of queries search module will generate i.e. Object queries of nested queries. Nested type queries are required to filter agreement based on inner collections like team, associations etc..
Few scenarios are : 1.	Find all agreements where logged in user is primary owner of the agreement
                            2.	Find all agreements that are pending approval from logged in user
                            3.	Find all agreements which are awaiting signature from user A
NOTE: Before marking this setting as true, data in entities and documents indices will have to be reindexed with updated dynamic templates.

This will give the list attributes which is allowed to display for particular entity if any particular attribute is globally non searchable. This attribute will override the attribute if it is present in globally non searchable attribute list.

This will give the list of entity specific attributes. In this list entity will be attached with attributes. These attributes will not be displayed for attached entity. The format will be as below, Entity Name:#separated attribute list
This will give the list of globally non searchable attributes. These attributes will not be display for any entity ok search index and list pages
JSON object defines the action names after choosing user will remains on details page. This feature is done for agreement only and it can be extend to other entities like contract request.

This config setting specifies roles for which notification will not be sent  when a (Ad Hoc) team member is added or removed > We can have multiple roles separated by '|' (pipe) e.g. Observer|Compliance|BusinessOwner|ContractAdmin > The roles will be the 'RoleName'
Entity name of the master data which stores upload template and xml template file for associate documents file upload.

This config setting specify the type of contract that will be given permission to override the mandatory field
validations default system value (for the entity instances) by the value passed by the caller(clients: e.g.: Excel add-in) consuming the service.  Type of Contract are the base typs could be [Agreement, AssociatedDocument, Masterdata, ContractRequest].
Skip generation of action request against existing DeProvisioned team member(s)
This key contains value of Maximum Page size for all grids in application
This key contains value of page size i.e. step provided by system. Based on this value, available page sizes are calculated.. Based on this value, available page sizes are calculated.

The system will log all log messages with same or lower log level. For example, with warning log level, all log methods with a level parameter value of Warning, Error, Critical, and LogAlways are written

This value will be used in add Notes popup to mark it as private or public.  Only internal userss can mark notes as private or public. External user will not see this option. Any note added by external user will be public to all.
This default value will be used in add Notes popup to mark it as private or public
This value is used on Note Tab. Use comma seperated names from possible values to hide columns from Note Grid or List. This configuration setting will hide those columns from external users.

When this flag is set to true, files that have invalid QR codes (including invalid agreement number, missing QR codes, missing pages, pages out of order etc.) can still be uploaded. If the value is set to false, such documents are prevented from being uploaded. Setting this flag to true should be done in consultation with customers as it may have an impact on compliance.
This value is used to set QRCode Width and Height.
Use this config key is only applicable for Approval rules and Agreement type CT.  This key will be used to display/hide Select Attribute button in rules wizard.   Core / default value will be false.

The key contains a java script array that defines bulk actions available in ICM. For each bulk action, we need to define an id, its display text,  action string and what client side method to execute for processing the bulk action. We can add new custom bulk actions by adding an element in this array with a custom javascript method name which will be called when user triggers the bulk action. Please mention method's fully qualified name. The method should expect a single argument which will be an array of selected records on which bulk action needs to be taken. The method name must be specified for custom bulk actions.
This indicates default sort for search results .

Flag to determine whether to enable or disable the search visualization button on advanced search page.'Search Visualization' helps the end user to create various graphical representations of the saved search results and also use them as KPI tiles.  The existing graphical representations are - bar graph, pie chart, line graph, area graph and stack chart.  If set to 'true' the search visualization button will be enabled (shown) on advanced search page. If set to 'false' it will disable(hide) the search visualization button.

This setting contains configuration to control the rendering of suggestions when user performs a global search on the ICM dashboard. This setting controls various aspects of suggestions which are listed below
1. Number of suggestions to display
 2. Entities to perform search against
 3. Fields per entity with specific widths to be displayed in suggestion entry
 4. Number of character user must type into the search box to trigger the search
5. Mode of search (metadata/fulltext/combined)
This setting re-presents the search UI controls which are to be displayed on UI.

This setting toggles the search authorization condition grouping. Earlier search authorization grouping was [SG access AND (OU visibility OR team Access)]. If this setting is set to true, this grouping will change to [(SG access && OU Visibility) OR Team Access]. In other words, if value of this setting is  false, any user who is present in the agreement team (without access in SG and/or organization path) will still be able to view that agreement in search grid. (Applicable for all entities agreement/masterdata/contract request/associated document/templates/clauses)
Should JavaScript be removed from PDF during upload to storage

This key specifies if ICM should create service bus messaging entities (i.e. Topic, Queue & Subscription ) if does not exist. If value is false then these entities need to be created externally as ICM will not ensure if required messaging entities are present. This should be set to true in case of old versioned (e.g. on-prem SB v2.1) is being used with the latest azure service bus SDK (v2.9).

This key contains Time Unit for SLA, Reminder and Notification frequency defined under SLA Matrix. However, for “Hours” value – Scheduled notification task frequency need to be set on hourly basis. By default, it will run daily once. This key value should be set strictly to Days for all customer use and should not be changed. And it can be set to Hours only for demo purposes.

Comma seperated list of contract types technical names. These entities will come under sourcing tile, these entities will be filtered from normal agreement creation.
In order to create the agreememts of these types user will have to use Create tile under Sourcing tab. For example the list can be like ICMRFP,ICMRFx,ICMRFI,ICMRFQ which are the technical names of the contract types.
This configuration setting specifies whether comments are mandatory or not while manually adding a team member in team
Identify if the team from agreement needs to copied to the associated documents

Applicable only for Template.  A checkbox with label 'Highlight PDF Preview' is shown on template details page.
By default the non-highlighted or default preview will be visible (When 'Highlight PDF Preview' checkbox is not selected).  On selecting the 'Highlight PDF Preview' checkbox the preview will be displayed with the attribute, clause & signatory tags highlighted as configured(e.g. Yellow, Light Gray & Red.).  User can toggle between the highlighted and default PDF preview document by checking/un-checking the 'Highlight PDF Preview' checkbox

Enable access control for templates.  Turning this option on will remove shared access from templates And access will be controlled by combination of team and org hierarchy  Template management screens will be access controlled. (With shared access all templates are available to all users). Template selection while rule creation and agreement creation will still show all templates

Set OrgPath for template when Enable access control for Templates.  As part of enable access control on, we need to set correct OrgPath for templates, for org access. This will restrict access to users having access to specified org path. Its value can be any org path from available org structure.
This key shows or hides the screen for creating extension attributes while creating templates.
This  configuration key will be used for provide grid view on template selection page in addition to existing Tile view. This is applicable for both Agreement and Association instance.
Flag to determine if the Compliance Management tile should be visible. If true, then Compliance Management tile will be visible.  If false, then Compliance Management tile will not be visible

ime interval to refresh user static list (In seconds). This setting is used to build users static list in memory.So after every 60 seconds system will check if there are any new or modified users available in Db.
Boolean value to determine User permissions through Security Group.
Comma separated list indicating the type(s) of UI to be supported in User Selection popups.
This key contains default value of secondary owner to be added while creating new user or auto provisioning. This value can be individual email id or group name
This key is to get name of the subscription for Replace User Task
Cost Center Attribute Name.
Contract Extension Entity Name (Value's can be comma seperated)
The Entity Name for gContracts Agreement
The Entity Name for Other Party Contact Master
Metadata of the entity specified by the setting Customization.Googl.IndicationEntityName which will be used to display the indicator on UI
Value of the metadata specified by setting Customization.Googl.IndicationEntityAttributeName

Entity for which a special indicator will be shown on UI in lookup dropdown and search lookup popup when the its metadata specified by setting Customization.Googl.IndicationEntityAttributeName has value equal to the value specified by setting Customization.Googl.IndicationEntityAttributeValue
List of all association which are to be made mandatory runtime based on action user is trying to perform
This setting controls whether to show CIR step in the Check & Sign tab of the team tab

The agreement renewal option for 'Agreement does not renew'

A string key prefixes and keys for fetching customization resources for client side script.
A string containing the name of client specific custom utilities assembly file.
The default precision to be used for decimal data type viz. Total Length specified while adding attribute
The default scale to be used for decimal data type viz. No of Decimals specified while adding attribute
Controls the default value of User Preference setting Open in same tab on click of View icon
Default Organization Path Id

The default length of the string properties to be used by the entity service, when creating a new entity. All String properties will have the column type set to nvarchar[1000]. NOTE : Setting this to zero makes entity service to create all string properties as nvarchar[max]
Delay in millisecond after resume workflow
Department Attribute Name.
Boolean true/false to disable/enable Apis vulnerable to security threats.

Show business status On Create OR Edit wizard. If set to false, the attribute will not be available to end user to set value.  This flag does not indicate wheter to use BusinessStatus or Sattus for Status display on detials it is handled by another flag
This config defines the access key to be used by document service
This config value tells the conversion strategy to be used.
This setting defines the name of the topic used for document conversion. For example conversion from DOCX to PDF
Dependent on FileEncryptionMode. If this setting is true use TripleDES else NoEncryption
Indicates expiry time for shared access signature in hours
Indicates  whether to use OCRing service or not
Setting that enables document of certain format to be indexed

Agreement 'Effective Date' will be the 'Exact Effective Date' value 
Note: This values of ICMEffectiveDateOption choice attribute has to be set/changed/verified at the time of Deployment or whenever the configuration changes

Agreement 'Effective Date' will be the First Day of the Month following the Latter of Two Signature Dates (by Two Signature Dates we mean 'Google Sign Date' & 'Partner Sign Date') Note: This values of ICMEffectiveDateOption choice attribute has to be set/changed/verified at the time of Deployment or whenever the configuration changes

Agreement 'Effective Date' will be the First Day of the Month following the Month in which Google Signs. Note: This values of ICMEffectiveDateOption choice attribute has to be set/changed/verified at the time of Deployment or whenever the configuration changes

Agreement 'Effective Date' will be the First Day of the Month in which Google Signs. Note: This values of ICMEffectiveDateOption choice attribute has to be set/changed/verified at the time of Deployment or whenever the configuration changes

Agreement 'Effective Date' will be the First Day of the Month in which Partner Signs. Note: This values of ICMEffectiveDateOption choice attribute has to be set/changed/verified at the time of Deployment or whenever the configuration changes

Agreement 'Effective Date' will be the Date on which Google Signs.Note: This values of ICMEffectiveDateOption choice attribute has to be set/changed/verified at the time of Deployment or whenever the configuration changes

greement 'Effective Date' will be the Latter of the Two Signature Date (by Two Signature Dates we mean 'Google Sign Date' & 'Partner Sign Date'). Note: This values of ICMEffectiveDateOption choice attribute has to be set/changed/verified at the time of Deployment or whenever the configuration changes

Agreement 'Effective Date' will be the Date on which Partner Signs.  Note: This values of ICMEffectiveDateOption choice attribute has to be set/changed/verified at the time of Deployment or whenever the configuration changes
The setting that lists masterdata entity attributes which are to be stripped from ES query in order to implemente authorization
Flag that enables/disables document indexing
The claim to be used to match email value to auto provision or update user information in ICM
All email sent from ICM using Email From Address Settings
The name of the topic on which the emails to be sent out are sent.
The SMTP Server Password
Email Queue
The Email Server Name
Email Server Port
Email User Name
A boolean flag indicating whether or not to allow auto user provisioning.
The flag indicating whether to combined metadata and fulltext search is available.

Agreement 'Expiry Date' will be the 'Exact Expiry Date' value. Note: This values of ICMExpiryDateOption choice attribute has to be set/changed/verified at the time of Deployment or whenever the configuration changes

Agreement 'Expiry Date' will be ['Effective Date'] + [number of 'Months from Effective Date' value]. Note: This values of ICMExpiryDateOption choice attribute has to be set/changed/verified at the time of Deployment or whenever the configuration changes

There Agreement will have no 'Expiry Date' (i.e. Evergreen Contracts). Note: This values of ICMExpiryDateOption choice attribute has to be set/changed/verified at the time of Deployment or whenever the configuration changes

The flag indicating whether to create SAML2 Logout Request message and send it to IdP to clear IdP SSO session.
If set to true, service provider will create SAML Logout request and will send to IdP. IdP will process the resquest
 and will send Logout response back to service provider application. Service provider application will process the response and will clear the user session. If set to false, service provider application will clear the user session and will redirect user to configured logout URL.

he WS federation trusted issuers. These are the name identifiers of the SAML tokens, the iDp will use to sign the token, The signing certificate is sent across in the SAML token. NOTE : A mismatch in the issuer name leads to the application crash with a WIF 10201 exception
